question: You have been consulted to admit the patient. Blood cultures have already been collected. The emergency department physician is seeking your input on the most appropriate antibiotic choice. You are eager to help and you recommend
explanation: Vancomycin provides coverage against resistant Gram-positive bacteria, particularly MRSA, while cefepime offers broad-spectrum coverage against Gram-negative bacteria, including Pseudomonas aeruginosa. This combination helps address the most common and dangerous pathogens until specific culture results guide targeted therapy.
